name: TeamAssist
0:
”Alexa, open Team Assist”
”List my teams”
”When is my next event”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: team assist
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Team Assist provides you with the ability to interact with your TeamSnap account. In order to use Team Assist you must link your Amazon account to your TeamSnap account. You will be able to do this when installing the Team Assist skill in the Alexa app. 

After the accounts have been successfully linked, you can start interacting with Team Assist by saying, "Alexa, open Team Assist." You can then interact with Team Assist using commands such as, "When is my next event?" or, "List my teams". Listing your teams will only list your active teams in TeamSnap. 

Currently, the only two things you can ask Team Assist about a specific team is, "What is the record for {team name}?" or "When is the {team name} next game (or event)?" More commands will be coming in future releases, such as, "What was the score of the {team name} last game?"

If you have multiple teams that you are associated with you can ask Team Assist, "When is my next event?" or, "When is my next game?"

You will only be able to obtain information for active teams with which you are associated in TeamSnap. To get a listing of these teams, after opening Team Assist tell Alexa to, "List my teams."
